mapper.sql: pick_lists_id AS "pickListsId",task_id AS "taskId",enclosure AS "enclosure",pick_lists_name AS "pickListsName",user_ids AS "userIds" ,remarks AS "remarks",note AS "note" , coding AS "coding" ,user_id AS "userId", source AS "source", source_id AS "sourceId", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId", status AS "status"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_production_pick_lists where 1 = 1
and pick_lists_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.pickListsId},'%')
and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.source},'%')
and source_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sourceId},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')
and pick_lists_id in
#{state}

select lists.pick_lists_id AS "pickListsId", lists.user_id AS "userId", sum(detail.number) AS "detailCount", sum(detail.received_number) AS "doneNumber", lists.create_time AS "createTime" from `daoxin_production_pick_lists` lists LEFT JOIN daoxin_production_pick_lists_detail detail on lists.pick_lists_id = detail.pick_lists_id GROUP BY lists.user_id

select lists.pick_lists_id AS "pickListsId", lists.user_id AS "userId", sum(detail.number) AS "detailCount", sum(detail.received_number) AS "doneNumber", lists.create_time AS "createTime" from `daoxin_production_pick_lists` lists LEFT JOIN daoxin_production_pick_lists_detail detail on lists.pick_lists_id = detail.pick_lists_id GROUP BY lists.user_id
